Sarvadeep Dhodi

Pianist



  • About Me
  • Photos/Recordings
  • Contact Me

I am a Pianist based in Mumbai, India. I have played at various shows, launches and other events, both as a solo performer and in a band. I arrange and play pieces from various genres, mainly Bollywood Music. I am also trained in Western Classical, and dabble in jazz and blues from time to time.

If you would like to hire me as a performer at an event, contact me using the information in the Contact page.

I can also arrange to have a complete band for a performance, if required. Let me know if this is the case.
